{"step_by_step_thinking": "Document 0 states that ABCG2 is a high-capacity urate transporter and its genetic impairment increases serum uric acid levels in humans. Document 1 also mentions that ABCG2 regulates serum uric acid via physiologically important roles in both renal and extra-renal urate excretion. Document 2 further supports this by stating that ABCG2 mediates urate transport and has an important role in extra-renal urate excretion, especially in intestinal excretion.
